pages.about-us: About UrbanSoles - Style Meets Comfort UrbanSoles HOME ABOUT US Shoes Contact About UrbanSoles At UrbanSoles, we believe that shoes are more than just a fashion statement—they are an expression of your personality and a key element of your comfort. Our mission is to provide high-quality, stylish, and comfortable footwear for every occasion. From casual sneakers to elegant formal shoes, our diverse collection is designed to cater to your unique style and needs. Our mission is simple: to offer footwear that not only looks good but feels great. We are committed to using sustainable materials and ethical manufacturing practices to create shoes that you can feel good about wearing. We envision a world where every step you take is confident and comfortable. Join us on this journey as we continue to innovate and inspire with our exceptional footwear collections. Our UrbanSoles Collection Step into the latest trends with UrbanSoles. Our collection offers a variety of styles, from chic casuals to elegant formals, ensuring you find the perfect pair for every occasion. Our Style UrbanSoles brings you footwear that blends fashion with comfort. Explore styles range and discover how styles designs can elevate ystyles style, making every step you take a statement. Our Quality Experience the excellence of UrbanSoles. Our shoes are crafted with premium materials to provide durability and comfort, ensuring you enjoy every moment you wear them. STEP INTO SPECIAL MOMENTS Discover and join us in celebrating special moments. Stay updated on styles upcoming events and be a part of the exciting occasions that unfold with UrbanSoles. pages.disclaimers: UrbanSoles - Disclaimers and Terms of Use UrbanSoles HOME ABOUT US Shoes Contact UrbanSoles Disclaimers By using this website, you agree to the following disclaimers: Product Information We strive to provide accurate information on our products. However, we cannot guarantee that all information is completely error-free. We reserve the right to change product information at any time without prior notice. Pricing and Availability Prices and availability of products are subject to change without notice. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Colors and Images We have made every effort to display product colors as accurately as possible on the website. However, due to monitor variations, the colors you see may not exactly match the product. Disclaimer of Warranties UrbanSoles disclaims all warranties, express or implied, including but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose. We do not warrant that the functions contained in the materials will be uninterrupted or error-free, that defects will be corrected, or that our website or the server that makes it available are free of viruses or other harmful components. Limitation of Liability UrbanSoles shall not be liable for any special or consequential damages that result from the use of, or the inability to use, the materials on this website or a linked website, even if UrbanSoles or an authorized representative has been notified of the possibility of such damages. (Some jurisdictions do not allow the limitation or exclusion of liability for incidental or consequential damages, so the above limitation may not apply to you.) Indemnification You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless UrbanSoles, its officers, directors, employees, agents, licensors and suppliers (collectively, the "Provider") from and against all losses, expenses, damages and costs, including reasonable attorneys' fees, resulting from any violation of these terms and conditions or any activity related to your use of the website. pages.privacy-policy: UrbanSoles - Privacy Policy UrbanSoles HOME ABOUT US Shoes Contact UrbanSoles Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy describes how UrbanSoles collects, uses, and discloses your personal information when you use our website. Information We Collect We may collect the following information: Contact information: name, email address, phone number, billing address, shipping address Payment information: credit card details (not stored directly by us), billing address Order history: details of your past purchases Browsing information: IP address, browsing history on our website How We Use Your Information We may use your information for the following purposes: To process your orders and fulfill your requests To send you marketing communications (with your consent) To personalize your experience on our website To improve our website and services To comply with legal and regulatory requirements Your Choices You have choices regarding your information: You can opt out of receiving marketing communications from us You can access and update your personal information Data Security We take reasonable steps to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no website is 100% secure. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will post any changes on this page.
